body.p: Enclosed you will find the petition of Col Husbands to be released from the payment of the forfeiture of a bond -- the particulars of which are set forth in the petition and certified to by Mr Smedley who was Jailor at the time.

I have presuaded upon our social relations to say to you that the Compliance with the Cols request will at this time be of much benefit to him & in doing so you will confer a favourrelief upon as loyal and as good a citizen as there is in our midst and place me in under many obligations= Hoping you may see fit to comply with our wish I am sincerely
